attributes.title: C-17 Cargo Plane Job Creation
attributes.description:
Created on February 24, 2010 by leo on Sourcemap.org:

This is from the Business Week article It's a Bird, It's a Plane, It's Pork!. The article illustrates how essential this military aircraft manufacturing is to preserving the jobs of some 30,000 people in 43 states, and the US government continues to order the planes despite the fact that the Pentagon no longer needs them.
